4312620.name: University of Progress
4312620.description:
Story

Millard Wilson is a 20-year-old sad PNG image attending his second year at Beacon University. A fictional college in San Francisco that claims to believe in second chances. Those who were failed by the system, those who were outcasts, and most importantly, those who can pay for tuition.

Millard’s been through enough to know it’s all just performative nonsense. He questions why he even applied. He's only going to end up in debt and unemployed.

At least college gives him plenty of opportunities to fuck up in new and exciting ways.

Features

Only 10% of the game is currently available in the demo.

The full release will include:

  • 15 unique endings based on your choices

  • Dozens of branching routes with moral and chaotic consequences

  • Character sprites with varied outfits and expressions

  • 30+ CG art

  • A nonlinear narrative that deepens with every ending unlocked

Things to do

  • Meet cute girls (and boys)

  • Mess with insecure men

  • Try not to get murdered by a Tumblr girl

  • Swallow assorted pills (not joking)

  • Read with a corny book girl

  • Make your roommate cry

  • Wonder why you chose this path

All characters depicted are 18 or older
4312620.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
